Flexbox Exercises

Thank you w3schools.

Flexbox Elements

1
2
3

Container Properties

The flex container properties are:

  • flex-direction
  • flex-wrap
  • flex-flow
  • justify-content
  • align-items
  • align-content

flex-direction: row (default)

1
2
3

flex-direction: column

1
2
3

flex-direction: row-reverse

1
2
3

flex-direction: column-reverse

1
2
3

flex-wrap: nowrap (default)

justify-content: center; align-items: center;

1

Item Properties

The flex item properties are:

  • order
  • flex-grow
  • flex-shrink
  • flex-basis
  • flex
  • align-self

order 3,1,2

1
2
3

flex-grow 1,2,3 (default: 0)

1
2
3

flex-grow 0,1,1

Item one will not grow.

1
2
3

flex-shrink 2,1,1 (default: 1)

1
2
3

flex-shrink 0,1,2

Item one will not shrink.

1
2
3

flex-shrink 0,0,0

Item one, two and three will not shrink.

1
2
3

flex-basis

This is like width but applies to the main axis.

1
2
3
4
5

flex-basis (flex-direction: column)

1
2
3
4
5

flex 0 1 200px, 0 0 200px, 1 0 200px

The flex property is a shorthand property for the flex-grow, flex-shrink, and flex-basis properties.

1
2
3

align-self

The align-self property overrides the default alignment set by the container's align-items property.

1
2
3
